foyer.description: You wake up in the dusty foyer of an abandoned house. The air is cold, and you swear you hear faint footsteps upstairs. There’s a hallway to the north.

hallway.description: The hallway is lined with broken picture frames. The floor creaks under your weight. There’s a locked door to the east and the foyer behind you to the south.

study.description:
You step into a dusty study.
It's so dark you can barely make anything out, if only you had a light source.
A cold draft creeps from a cracked window. This might be your way out... if you can figure it out...
Maybe you should try to 'solve' the room.

flashlight.description: An old flashlight. The batteries are weak, but it might help you read things in the dark.

note.description: A torn piece of paper. Written in messy handwriting: 'Not everything is as it seems. Try 4-2-9.'

door_code.question: The study door has an old keypad lock. The note might be a clue. Enter the 3-digit code:
wrong_responses: The keypad buzzes angrily. You hear footsteps creak closer…
Wrong code. The hallway lights flicker for just a second.
A cold draft brushes the back of your neck. That was not right.

final_escape.question: The window is jammed shut. You hear the footsteps getting closer. Type 'push window' to force it open:
wrong_responses: You slam against the window, but it won’t budge. The footsteps are right outside the study now.
Your hands slip. The glass rattles but doesn’t break.
A whisper brushes your ear: 'Don’t leave…' You shiver. Try again quickly!
